headline: For The First Time Ever, Reese’s Puffs Cereal Goes Dark With New Dark Chocolate Flavor
summary: MINNEAPOLIS, December 04, 2025--Reese’s Puffs cereal is entering a new era with its first new flavor combo since the cereal debuted in 1994. Reese’s Puffs cereal Dark Chocolate Naturally Flavored is a richer, deeper take on the beloved peanut butter and chocolate combo, made with Hershey’s cocoa, real Reese’s Peanut Butter and the signature Reese’s Puffs cereal crunch fans love.

content.title: For The First Time Ever, Reese’s Puffs Cereal Goes Dark With New Dark Chocolate Flavor
content.summary: MINNEAPOLIS, December 04, 2025--Reese’s Puffs cereal is entering a new era with its first new flavor combo since the cereal debuted in 1994. Reese’s Puffs cereal Dark Chocolate Naturally Flavored is a richer, deeper take on the beloved peanut butter and chocolate combo, made with Hershey’s cocoa, real Reese’s Peanut Butter and the signature Reese’s Puffs cereal crunch fans love.

thumbnail.caption: Reese’s Puffs Dark Chocolate cereal delivers a deeper, richer take on the classic milk chocolate and peanut butter flavor combo.
